name: ZOMBIES IN A LAB
description:
ZOMBIES IN A LAB is a first-person arcade shooter. Kill the zombies before they kill you to get a high score!

MOVE - W/S
TURN - A/D
SHOOT - Spacebar

O - mute
R - restart game

This game was made for 7DFPS 2022 game jam. Thanks for playing!

Music:
Theramin Crazy by Applestreet Games: applestreet.itch.io/theramin-crazy-platformer-music
